snippet: Admitting that Islamist extremists now control some of his nation’s villages and towns, President Goodluck Jonathan declared a state of emergency on Tuesday across Nigeria’s troubled northeast.
abstract: Nigerian Pres Goodluck Jonathan declares state of emergency across troubled northeast after acknowledging that Islamist extremists now control several villages and towns.
lead_paragraph: Admitting that Islamist extremists now control some of his nation’s villages and towns, President Goodluck Jonathan declared a state of emergency on Tuesday across Nigeria’s troubled northeast.
